column2: I can't finish this review without noting that their strong suit is cocktails.  This is a place you come to for a good standard martini
column3: a nice glass of fine bourbon
column4: or a well made sazerac.  I think every bar should be measured by their ability to make a proper sazerac because it takes real talent
column6: and care.  It truly is a hand-crafted cocktail when prepared properly.  These mixologists know how to muddle it just right so all the flavors blend and become one. The proper straining is also important
column7: no one wants bits at the bottom of their glass.  Finally
column8: good ingredients are of course important
column9: and use of a proper glass should never be compromised by an ignorant or lazy bartender
column10: or an iconoclastic management. And of course
